posts.title: Quick Drying Shower Caddy
posts.content: Keeping the inside of your shower organized is easier than ever with this quick drying shower caddy. It can be conveniently hung on the shower curtain rod, features 3 large and 3 small pockets for storage, and is made from 100% mesh so it dries quickly after you’re done.

posts.title: Beer Tracking Bottle Opener
posts.content: Monitor your level of inebriation by popping open each brew using the beer tracking bottle opener. With each opened bottle, a helpful screen on the front displays the number of beers you’ve opened, allowing you to assess your raging alcoholism with accuracy.

posts.title: Hulk Fist Nightlight
posts.content: Hulk smash the boogie man with this destructive Hulk fist nightlight. The nightlight emits a soft green glow from a first shaped lamp that creates the illusion the Hulk has busted through your concrete wall like an angry version of the Kool-Aid man.

posts.title: iCrayon Stylus Pen
posts.content: Play “Draw Something” with your friends on a whole new level with the iCrayon stylus pen that will make you feel like you’ve entered the digital age of drawing and coloring. Available in multiple crayon colors, the iCrayon pen is the perfect gift for Draw Something fans.

posts.title: Inflatable Drink Floaties
posts.content: Protect your drink from sinking to its watery grave with the inflatable drink floatie. People aren’t the only ones that require a life guard on duty – and with a floatie snuggly wrapped snugly around your drink, you can practice responsible drinking while on the water.

posts.title: Glow Stick Bracelets
posts.content: Keep the party going into the wee hours of the morning with these glow stick bracelets. These vibrant bracelets come in every color under the neon rainbow and are guaranteed to shine bright for the entire duration of your drug riddled adventure!

posts.title: Oops Vinyl Eraser
posts.content: Mistakes will become something to smile about when using the “oops!” vinyl eraser to correct them. This comical vinyl eraser is perfect for use on all types of paper and leaves the surface smudge free so you can continue working on a clean sheet, free of mistakes.

posts.title: Fruit Freshness Extender
posts.content: Keep your fruits from spoiling by prolonging their life with the fruit freshness extender. The set of two small blue apples come with a packet that absorbs the ethylene gas – which is what causes produce like fruits and veggies to over ripen and eventually spoil.

posts.title: Wrench Eating Utensil Set
posts.content: Now the handyman in your house will never have to be far from their beloved tools when they begin eating with the wrench utensil set. These handy utensils feature a sturdy stainless steel build and are shaped like various tools on the at the base.

posts.title: Muhammad Ali Book
posts.content: Get an unprecedented look into the life of your favorite boxer by adding this Muhammad Ali book to your collection. Photojournalist Steve Schapiro provides a glimpse into the personal life of the legendary boxer through a series of photographs captured in 1963.

posts.title: LEGO Brick Eraser Set
posts.content: Battle boredom in the workplace by stocking up on the LEGO brick eraser set – office supplies that doubles as toys. Sure they’ll correct your writing errors, but the real fun of these LEGO erasers comes from playing with them as if they were your own toys!

posts.title: Ninja Star Wall Hooks
posts.content: Keep your room tidy with ninja-like precision by using the ninja star wall hooks to make sure everything stays in its rightful place. Once you skillfully throw the star and lodge it into the wall, its star-like shape lends itself as a great hanging spot for just about anything.
